hgr::UserPropertySet Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <UserPropertySet.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::UserPropertySet:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Set of node name based user property strings.

Individual strings can be accessed by name in constant time. Format of strings is not restricted in any way, but usually user property strings contain set of X=... values separated by newline character.
